footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Build: Citlali | Update Date: 01/03/2025 | Editor: zmizuneko

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value: __Starcaller's Watch__ - Citlali's signature that gives her the best balance between team buffs and a strong shield.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__A Thousand Floating Dreams__ - strong EM stat stick that also provides a teamwide EM and ATK% buff.
__Wandering Evenstar__ - an EM stat stick that also provides a good teamwide ATK% buff.
__Thrilling tales of dragon slayers__ - provides the biggest ATK% buff at the cost of losing some Elemental mastery. 
__Favonius codex__ - ER% stat stick for energy heavy teams.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Elemental mastery/Energy recharge%|<goblet> Elemental mastery/Cryo dmg bonus%*|<circlet> Elemental mastery/CRIT*

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental skill
**2)** Elemental burst*
**3)** Normal attacks*

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: *Citlali, as an Elemental mastery scaler can be built for damage since her ascension 4 passive gives her a sizeable elemental burst dmg buff, allowing her to deal high damage with her melts.
